Get models by params

Name Type Argument Description

 Filtering and sorting parameters
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
count int <optional>
 24 Number of results
offset int <optional>
 Offset for pagination
sort_by string <optional>
 '-createdAt' Sorting field ['-createdAt', '-viewCount', '-likeCount']
search string <optional>
 Search term
flag string <optional>
 Flag: ['staffpicked']
categories string <optional>
 Category id
tags string <optional>
 Tags
date int <optional>
 Filter on the last X days
face_count int <optional>
 Filter on the number of faces
liked_by string <optional>
 User id to get likes from
user string <optional>
 User id to get models from
folder string <optional>
 Folder id to get models from
